name: CYMATIC EXPLOSION
description: What if the burning sun is just an explosion we experience in slow motion. With the flood of energy waves reflecting onto its own borders, shaping the incomprehensible mathematical complexity of life. Everything from the shell of the turtle, to the fractals of the cabbage. When we meditate on our nanosecond of a life, maybe we hold back time from returning into the rush of the explosion exterminating us forever.
